title.rendered: Great chance to take up last minute regional opening for smaller teams

content.rendered: A remaining opening at Westminster Academy Regional on Oct 8 and for Oxford University on October 15. To fill the opening smaller teams are OK. If you have a school group or science club, this is a great opportunity. If interested contact Jenny Lyons at j.lyons@uksdc.org
